subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Clinton Portis is by far the N.F.L.’s leading rusher, with 818 yards, 7 touchdowns, a league-high 163 carries and four consecutive 120-yard games.
snippet: Clinton Portis is by far the N.F.L.’s leading rusher, with 818 yards, 7 touchdowns, a league-high 163 carries and four consecutive 120-yard games.
